Authentication

Configure authentication methods for your custom connectors

Introduction

Authentication is a critical component of connector development. Workato supports various authentication methods to securely connect to external services.

Supported Authentication Methods

API Key Authentication

Use API keys for simple, token-based authentication.

Configuration

Add the following to your connection.rb file:

{
  "authorization": {
    "type": "api_key",
    "api_key": "your-api-key-here"
  }
}

OAuth 2.0

Implement OAuth 2.0 for secure, token-based authentication.

Setup Steps

  1. Register your application with the service provider
  2. Configure OAuth credentials in your connector
  3. Implement the authorization flow

Basic Authentication

Use HTTP Basic Authentication for simple username/password authentication.

Best Practices

  • Store credentials securely using encrypted settings files
  • Implement proper token refresh mechanisms
  • Handle authentication errors gracefully
  • Use HTTPS for all authentication requests
